title: Sub-zone Configuration Schema
description: Schema for validating sub-zone configuration files in the MythosMUD world hierarchy

environment.description: Default environmental classification for this sub-zone

lucidity_drain_rate.description: Rate at which player lucidity drains in this sub-zone

npc_spawn_modifier.description: Multiplier for NPC spawn rates in this sub-zone

combat_modifier.description: Combat difficulty modifier for this sub-zone

exploration_bonus.description: Bonus to exploration rolls in this sub-zone

access_requirements.description: Requirements needed to access this sub-zone
